documentation.text:
@dev Checks for if a user is already reigstered as a publisher AND if they haven't authored an article yet.
Checks authorAddressToArticleIds and loops though publishers. There is no createAuthor or authors array to save authors gas.

addAuthorToPublication(address).details: We only check if its a publication, not a specific publication, since we use msg.sender to add to the authors array. Only adds non-publishers.

params._authorAddress: The address of the author to be added.

createPublication().details: Checks for if a user is already reigstered as a publisher AND if they haven't authored an article yet. Checks authorAddressToArticleIds and loops though publishers. There is no createAuthor or authors array to save authors gas.

isRegisteredPublisher().details: Used via UI ONLY. Use modifiers for function checks.

returns._0: True if publisher account. False is not.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

postArticle(bytes,address).details: Checks if user is a member of the publication. UI should tell user to use 0x0 address if self-published or to create their own publisher account.

params._articleHash: IPFS hash of text written by the author

params._authorAddress: The address of the author to be removed.

returns._0: Returns true is successfully removed. False is not removed.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._articleHash: The hash of the new version of the article's text
params._articleId: The id of the article being updated

addAuthorToPublication(address).notice: Adds an author to a publication's approved authors. Can only be called by a publication.

isRegisteredPublisher().notice: View function that checks if the current user is a publisher account.

postArticle(bytes,address).notice: Posts a new article to IPFS
